docs.lead_paragraph: A North Korean suspect detained by Malaysia in connection with the bizarre airport murder of Kim Jong Nam will be deported to Pyongyang on Friday and not allowed back, the Malaysian deputy prime minister said on Friday.

headline.main: North Korean Suspect in Airport Murder to Be Deported From Malaysia and Not Allowed Back
headline.print_headline: North Korean Suspect in Airport Murder to Be Deported From Malaysia and Not Allowed Back

docs.snippet: A North Korean suspect detained by Malaysia in connection with the bizarre airport murder of Kim Jong Nam will be deported to Pyongyang on Friday and not allowed back, the Malaysian deputy prime minister said on Friday....

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Attorney General Jeff Sessions said on Thursday he would stay out of any probe into alleged Russian meddling in the 2016 presidential election but maintained he did nothing wrong by failing to disclose he met last year with Russia's ambassador.

headline.main: Under Fire, Trump's Attorney General Removes Himself From Campaign Probes
headline.print_headline: Under Fire, Trump's Attorney General Removes Himself From Campaign Probes

docs.lead_paragraph: The Dutch fishing village of Volendam hardly seems like a hotbed of discontent: tidy, prosperous, little crime or unemployment. Yet a third of its voters are likely to back anti-immigrant nationalist Geert Wilders in the March 15 general election.

headline.main: Dutch Paradox: Voters Head for Far Right Amidst Rising Prosperity
headline.print_headline: Dutch Paradox: Voters Head for Far Right Amidst Rising Prosperity

docs.snippet: The Dutch fishing village of Volendam hardly seems like a hotbed of discontent: tidy, prosperous, little crime or unemployment. Yet a third of its voters are likely to back anti-immigrant nationalist Geert Wilders in the March 15 general election....

docs.lead_paragraph: If the merger of the London Stock Exchange and Deutsche Boerse goes ahead, it would have its head office in London as planned, LSE Chief Executive Xavier Rolet said on Friday.

headline.main: LSE-Deutsche Boerse HQ Would Be in London-LSE CEO
headline.print_headline: LSE-Deutsche Boerse HQ Would Be in London-LSE CEO

docs.snippet: If the merger of the London Stock Exchange and Deutsche Boerse goes ahead, it would have its head office in London as planned, LSE Chief Executive Xavier Rolet said on Friday....

docs.lead_paragraph: South Korean firms are being squeezed in China, in suspected retaliation for Seoul's deployment of a U.S. missile defense system, highlighting the tools China can deploy to hit back at the corporate interests of trade partners it disagrees with.

headline.main: China Hints at Trade War Strategy in South Korea Standoff
headline.print_headline: China Hints at Trade War Strategy in South Korea Standoff

docs.lead_paragraph: Former France soccer great Raymond Kopa, who won three European Cups with Real Madrid in the 1950s, died at the age of 85 on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Former France and Real Madrid Great Kopa Dies Aged 85

docs.lead_paragraph: The U.N. Security Council on Friday kicked off a visit to spotlight Africa's worst humanitarian crisis as millions face hunger amid the Boko Haram insurgency in Nigeria and the Lake Chad region.

headline.main: UN Security Council Begins Africa Trip Focused on Boko Haram
headline.print_headline: UN Security Council Begins Africa Trip Focused on Boko Haram

docs.snippet: The U.N. Security Council on Friday kicked off a visit to spotlight Africa's worst humanitarian crisis as millions face hunger amid the Boko Haram insurgency in Nigeria and the Lake Chad region....

docs.lead_paragraph: A North Korean chemist deported from Malaysia accused police of threatening to kill his family unless he confessed to the assassination of the half-brother of North Korea's leader, calling it a plot to tarnish his country's honor.

headline.main: Deported Korean Says Malaysia Threatened to Harm His Family
headline.print_headline: Deported Korean Says Malaysia Threatened to Harm His Family

docs.snippet: A North Korean chemist deported from Malaysia accused police of threatening to kill his family unless he confessed to the assassination of the half-brother of North Korea's leader, calling it a plot to tarnish his country's honor....

docs.lead_paragraph: Thousands of people have rallied in the Georgian capital to protest a court verdict handing a top opposition-minded television station to a government-friendly owner.

headline.print_headline: Thousands in Georgia Rally to Support Popular TV Station

docs.snippet: Thousands of people have rallied in the Georgian capital to protest a court verdict handing a top opposition-minded television station to a government-friendly owner....
